game.name: Kalyskah
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fight as a vampire while exploring a dark fantasy open-world in this 3rd person RPG. Make choices to affect the betterment of humanity– or yourself; strengthen your vampiric skills to fight bandits, trolls, and undead; and entertain yourself in fully animated seductive scenes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fight as a vampire while exploring a dark fantasy open-world in this 3rd person RPG. Make choices to affect the betterment of humanity– or yourself; strengthen your vampiric skills to fight bandits, trolls, and undead; and entertain yourself in fully animated seductive scenes.
